name: ORDER_RAD_IMG_UID
description: This table stores the DICOM image instance UIDs associated with a radiology order.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the number of image instance UIDs associated with an order. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this.

columns.name: IMAGE_INSTANCE
columns.description: The unique identifier of the DICOM image instance.
